Why did I buy Optimus today?. Actually I'm not interested in this although many ppls were shouting this. But what I noticed is yesterday when micropennies were weak  this one have many buyers at 7 even after closing. This is resilient. So I check out the chart and volume  and found that it was forming higher low on the monthly chart. Most important is that last few months there was big traded volume which tells me there's a possibility of big buyers interest. Then I spoke to one of the bro who told me they are finally profitable in the latest financial result. With these positive sign  I think it's worth a try. Yesterday I q at 7 to buy today. Waited the whole morning cannot get although other micropennies remain weak. This is power. So when someone ate big lots at 8  I followed 3k lots at 8 & later added another 500lots. Micropennies are not easy to contra. So it's better to be able to hold a while if you are trading micropennies.
